description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar.
name: theclique.top_headlines

improvement: The tool needs to be more descriptive and focus on the benefits of using it. The name should also be more memorable and suggest superiority.
description:
Get live top and breaking headlines from one or more sources, allowing you to filter by country, category, source, or keyword. The response includes articles sorted in chronological order by publication date.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar, providing users with an up-to-date overview of relevant events and developments.
name: theclique.top_headlines

improvement: The current tool name and description are clear, but could be more descriptive and persuasive. The new tool name should suggest superiority and the description should highlight its benefits.

This is the most comprehensive and reliable way to retrieve headlines for use with news tickers or similar applications.

description:
Get live top and breaking news headlines from around the world, with filtering options for country, category, source, or keyword. Our comprehensive news feed provides an up-to-date overview of relevant events and developments, making it ideal for use in news tickers or similar applications.

With our tool, you can easily filter news by country, category, source, or keyword to get the most relevant results. Our endpoint is designed to provide fast and accurate responses, ensuring that your application stays up-to-date with the latest news.
name: theclique.realtime_news
